Landing.aboutDesc1: NerdsNote is a fast, privacy‑first online notepad built for developers, writers, and anyone who needs a distraction‑free place to jot ideas. It runs in the browser, requires no account, and saves notes locally so your writing remains on your device.
Landing.aboutDesc2: Designed for speed and clarity, NerdsNote supports dark mode, offline use, keyboard shortcuts, quick search, import/export, and adjustable font size.
Landing.seoDesc: NerdsNote is a free online notepad and minimal note‑taking app. Write instantly in your browser with auto‑save, no sign‑up, and no ads.
Landing.keywords: free online notepad, distraction‑free writing app, browser‑based notes, local notes, privacy‑friendly notepad, simple notepad for developers.
Landing.privacyDataStorage: Data Storage: All your notes are stored locally in your browser's localStorage. We don't collect, store, or transmit any of your data to our servers unless you explicitly use the Share Links feature.
Landing.privacyShareLinks: Share Links: When you create a shareable link, your note content is uploaded to our secure servers and stored for 24 hours, after which it is automatically deleted. Anyone with the link can view the note during this period.
Landing.privacyNoTracking: No Tracking: We don't use cookies, analytics, or any tracking mechanisms. We don't track who views shared notes. Your privacy is completely protected.
Landing.privacyLocalOnly: Local Only (Default): By default, your notes remain on your device and are never sent to external servers. You have complete control over your data.
Landing.termsRisk: Use at Your Own Risk: This application is provided "as is" without any warranties. Use it at your own discretion.
Landing.termsShareLinks: Share Links: By using the Share Links feature, you consent to temporarily upload your note content to our servers. Links expire after 24 hours. Do not share sensitive or confidential information.
Landing.termsDataResp: Data Responsibility: You are responsible for backing up your notes. We recommend exporting important notes regularly.
Landing.termsNoGuarantees: No Guarantees: We don't guarantee data persistence. Browser updates, clearing data, or technical issues may result in data loss. Shared links may expire or become unavailable.
Landing.termsFreeService: Free Service: This is a free application. No payment or registration required.
Landing.builtByDesc: This project is crafted and maintained by Khueon Studios. We create clean, performant, and user‑friendly tools for the web.
Landing.faq1A: Yes. NerdsNote is completely free to use and does not require an account.
Landing.faq2A: All notes are stored locally in your browser using localStorage. Clearing browser data will remove them, so export important notes regularly.
Landing.faq3Q: Do I need an internet connection?
Landing.faq3A: No. After the first load, NerdsNote works offline in most modern browsers.
Landing.faq4Q: How do I export a note?
Landing.faq4A: Click the Download button to save the active note as a .txt file.
Landing.faq5Q: How do I import a .txt file?
Landing.faq5A: Use the Upload button and choose a .txt file. It will create a new note using the file name.
Landing.faq6A: NerdsNote is plain text. You can write Markdown syntax and export as .txt for use elsewhere.
Landing.faq7Q: Can I change the font size or theme?
Landing.faq7A: Yes. Use A+ / A- to adjust text size and the Sun/Moon toggle to switch themes.
Landing.faq8A: Not yet. All notes are stored locally on your device. Export notes to create backups.
Landing.faq9A: NerdsNote supports recent versions of Chrome, Edge, Firefox, and Safari.
Landing.faq10A: NerdsNote is built by Khueon Studios. Visit khueonstudios.com to learn more.
